originalText.text: I will be honest, after being a patient of this practice for over 20 years, I was afraid when my longtime dentist retired. However, I was pleasantly surprised today. Everyone was so kind. The updates to the office are so welcoming and after my visit with Dr. Lee, I am already feeling relief and less discomfort for a longstanding issue I was experiencing. My daughter, a new patient to this practice, also went this week and loved it!

text.text: I will be honest, after being a patient of this practice for over 20 years, I was afraid when my longtime dentist retired. However, I was pleasantly surprised today. Everyone was so kind. originalText.text: My mom recommended me this dental office as she is a current patient of this office. This was my first time visiting the office to see Dr. Lee. It was a pleasant experience. The staff and Dr. Lee were are all friendly and professional. I waited no more than 10 minutes from my scheduled appointment and this was only due to completing some paperwork as this was my first visit. Dr. Lee made my visit comfortable and was very detailed when discussing my dental health. Not only was the visit pleasant, but Dr. Lee took the initiative to email me a recap of what was discussed and touched base with me a few hours after the visit to check-in if I was experiencing any discomfort or pain from my visit. I greatly appreciate this experience, most doctors won’t take this initiative they would wait until the patient contacts them with a problem or a concern. I look forward to seeing Dr. Lee in the near future for other upcoming dental work already scheduled. I would highly recommend Dr. Lee and this office to anyone, in fact I just recommended a colleague of mines who is seeking a Dentist.

originalText.text: Dr. Victor Lee is seeing my cousin, a special needs patient, with extensive treatment needs. His patience and compassion have been evident throughout treatment.  We were extremely impressed and comforted as he addressed our concerns. He went above and beyond all expectations even contacting us on New Year’s Eve to address a concern before treatment began the following Monday.  Everything went smoothly and my cousin is thrilled with the outcome and the fabulous care that she has and is receiving.  Dr. Lee is truly exceptional!

originalText.text: Dr. Lee is amazing. Had novocain in the past and I felt every jab of the needle but with Dr. Lee barely felt anything. He and his staff accommodated me because I was very anxious about my tooth pain. He informed me of all my options and possibilities. Felt comfortable and at ease. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: Dr Victor Lee has provided excellent service. He directed the service of 6 implants and permanent dentures. He is confident in his execution. Professional in explaining details, very courteous. Amiable and supportive in challenging circumstances. He is highly recommended.
